name: Luftwaffe: Deutsch Kuugun o Shiki seyo
overview: Luftwaffe - Doitsu Kuugun o Shiki Seyo puts the player as the commander of the Germany Air Force, (Luftwaffe), in the Second World War. A dynamic system in real-time moving all forces, including highlights and full of flowing 3D battle screen! Commitment propeller aircraft, ranging about 100 aircraft models accurately portrayed. The combination of aircraft and pilots, infinite variations of troops, or troops to make up any kind of player.
